title: Want to use AI for your personal finances? Choose your questions carefully.
description: Unless you know what you are looking for, artificial intelligence can give wrong or misleading on investment strategies.
content: It has the ability to get you quick answers, but many investors don’t know which questions to ask or the specific terminology to use in the first place, says Nick Holeman, director of financial planning at robo-advisor Betterment. And even then chatb... [5251 chars]

title: China-ASEAN AI Collaboration: A New Era of Cross-Border Cooperation
description: The China (Guangxi)–ASEAN Artificial Intelligence Application Ecosystem Exchange Conference 2025 in Nanning highlighted 'AI+' collaboration, with over 30 achievements and 50 agreements. The event focused on integrating AI with the real economy, featuring forums and exhibitions, and aimed at solidifying AI partnerships between China and ASEAN.

title: UAE Public Prosecution Engages in AI and Justice Dialogue at BRICS Meeting
description: The UAE Public Prosecution participated in the 7th BRICS Meeting on legal strategies involving artificial intelligence, under Brazil's chairmanship. The UAE emphasized its dedication to modern tech in legal processes and international cooperation, aiming at law enforcement, rights protection, and justice promotion, reaffirming ties with global partners.
content: The UAE Public Prosecution has taken an active role in the recent 7th Meeting of Heads of Prosecution Services of BRICS Countries, chaired by Brazil's Federal Public Prosecutor's Office. The virtual assembly explored the theme of 'Artificial Intellig... [1019 chars]
